publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4206 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Ross Gazey and Cameron Fraser—That the Parliament congratulates Ross Gazey from Aberdeen’s Robert Gordon University and SiGen Ltd and Cameron Fraser from Heriot-Watt University and Caledonian Aerotech Ltd for their success at the Knowledge Transfer Partnerships (KTP) annual awards in London and furthermore commends SiGen for promoting the development of hydrogen from renewable energy sources as carbon-free fuel vector for the remote and island communities around Scotland.

S2M-4206 Brian Adam: Congratulations to Ross Gazey and Cameron Fraser—That the Parliament congratulates Ross Gazey from Aberdeen’s Robert Gordon University and SiGen Ltd and Cameron Fraser from Heriot-Watt University and Caledonian Aerotech Ltd for their success at the Knowledge Transfer Partnerships (KTP) annual awards in London and furthermore commends SiGen for promoting the development of hydrogen from renewable energy sources as carbon-free fuel vector for the remote and island communities around Scotland. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Mr David Davidson*, Shiona Baird*, Bruce Crawford*, Chris Ballance*, Jim Mather*
S2M-4206 Congratulations to Ross Gazey and Cameron Fraser (lodged on 29 March 2006) Stewart Stevenson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Fiona Hyslop*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-4206 Congratulations to Ross Gazey and Cameron Fraser (lodged on 29 March 2006) Mr Jim Wallace*
S2M-4206 Congratulations to Ross Gazey and Cameron Fraser (lodged on 29 March 2006) Robin Harper*
